channel.title: Need Help When i Run My 508 Server it Says
channel.description:
"the system cannot find the path specified"
I Use Window's Vista Home Edition So Can Anyone Help Me?
everyone i ask gets mad :(
I just need a little help and ill LOVE you forever :) (lol Jk ,but you know what i mean...)

item.title: Need Help When i Run My 508 Server it Says
item.dc:creator: @coaco260 coaco260
item.description:
@coaco260 wrote:

well ive got the java 6 update 3 ( jdk 1.6.0_03 ) download this one it works…

https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewFilteredProducts-SingleVariationTypeFilter

its the first link well it workd for me…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 16, 2008, 09:23:47 pm[/size][hr]also check out this page
http://java.sun.com/products/archive/
it gives u older versions but the i gave you is the one i know works but. yea check out this page also[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 16, 2008, 09:25:29 pm[/size][hr]then when you after download one of the old javas jsut go to edit in ur run.bat or compiler and put ur version.

item.title: Need Help When i Run My 508 Server it Says
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Lol okay so it can not find your version of jdk or jre in the compiler/runner. what you need to do is go to your C:\Program Files\java and look and find your most up to date versions and repleace the paths in your cmpiler/runner with those paths
